dcterms:description: A collection of annotated posts from the GAB website, consisting of binary labels indicating whether a post is hateful or not, along with explanations provided by crowd workers.

dcterms:description: A collection of posts from Reddit indicating whether they are hateful or not, containing ten ordinal labels aggregated into a continuous hate speech severity score.
